data_structures

Class Red_Black_Tree_Node<Key_Type,Value_Type>

  • java.lang.Object
    • data_structures.Red_Black_Tree_Node<Key_Type,Value_Type>

  • public class Red_Black_Tree_Node<Key_Type,Value_Type>
extends java.lang.Object
    Node that Red Black Tree uses to store data. Node contains information about its key, value, left and right children, its color and how many nodes its subtrees contain. Class also has two static functions. One determines whether given nodes color is red, one changes given nodes color to opposite color and one return amount of nodes in given nodes subtrees.

        value - Value for new node.
        color - Color for new node.
        sub_trees - Amount of nodes in new nodes subtrees.

    • Method Detail

      • is_red

        public static boolean is_red(Red_Black_Tree_Node node)
        Determines whether given node is red or not.
        Parameters:
        node - Node thats color is checked.
        Returns:
        True if nodes color is red and false f color is black. if node is null return false.

      • size

        public static int size(Red_Black_Tree_Node node)
        Return the amount of nodes in given nodes subtrees.
        Parameters:
        node - Node which subtree count is returned.
        Returns:
        amount of nodes in given nodes subtrees. If node is null return 0.

        node - Node thats color is changed.
